name: Wizard Defense (Joni Suojanen)
description:
Albie the Traveling Wizard explores the multiverse looking for precious crystals to power up his magical powers and find his way home! Unfortunately the world’s he travels do not like him, and the local creatures try to steal his gems, Albie must survive long enough to find enough gemstones so that he can open a portal and continue his search! 

A unique blend of Roguelite elements mixed with Carcassone like tile management with Tower Defense

Created by: 
Joni Suojanen, Programming, Game Design

Antti Keinänen: 3D Art, Game Design

Nina Nylander: 2D Art
